name: Avatar of Shoth
description: The Avatar of Shoth is a gargantuan creature with oozy tendrils, capable of blending into its surroundings. It has a grotesque form that can deform slightly, enabling it to pass through narrow spaces effortlessly.
memorable: Its ability to absorb knowledge and replicate enemy abilities, coupled with powerful spells and a debuff aura, makes it a terrifying presence in combat.
goals: To dominate its foes through manipulation and overwhelming force, while absorbing knowledge from its targets.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other shoth creatures, serving as leaders or powerful allies in combat.
environment: Typically found in dark, cavernous areas or mystical realms where aberrations thrive.
strengths: High hit points, exceptional Charisma and Wisdom, various immunities, and the ability to replicate others' abilities make it a strategic threat.
weaknesses: Lower Dexterity makes it easier to hit and can hinder its initiative in combat.
attacks: Employs multiattack with tentacle strikes, inflicting both bludgeoning and acid damage. Acid Wave serves as a formidable area effect attack.
most_powerful_ability: Absorbent allows it to replicate any action performed by a damaged creature, turning opponents' strengths against them.
senses: Has blindsight and truesight both with a range of 60 feet, providing exceptional awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Shows strong skills in Insight, Perception, and Persuasion, allowing it to excel in social interactions and awareness during encounters.
additional_information: Beneficial Legendary Resistance to avoid failing saving throws can enhance its survivability.
The Soothing Aura ability can severely debuff nearby hostile creatures.
Innate Spellcasting without material components demonstrates its psionic capabilities.
Legendary Merge allows it to temporarily enhance weaker shoth creatures
Acid Wave and Consult the Zom provide area control and battlefield manipulation.
spellcasting: Can cast a variety of spells including area damage spells like Acid Splash and defensive spells like Shield.
